LanguageData.YS_KarmaTradeDebtResolution: With your negative karma balance, you could trigger Kaiyi's "debt resolution" service. In that scenario, terrible events would occur beyond your control.\n\nDo you still wish to gamble your fate?
LanguageData.YS_KaiyiKarmicChangeWarning:
Warning!

Changing storytellers from {0} to {1} will wipe your history of karmic trades for this game.

This will force you to begin a clean business relationship with Kaiyi the next time you work with him, with only the starting karma in the bank.

Please confirm that you want to wipe the ledger (clear Kaiyi's save data).

Alternatively, you can instruct Kaiyi to save all records of your karmic dealings, and reopen your account with him another time hassle-free (Mod settings > Kaiyi the Karmic > enable "Save karma ledger" to save karmic values).
LanguageData.YS_FarseerFanAltOffer: The stars foretell a divergence in fate- and so Farseer Fan calls upon you to make a choice.
LanguageData.YS_FarseerFanDeferOffer: Fate approaches, but it may be diverted yet. Should you call upon Farseer Fan to intercede, she will defer this destiny for a time.\n\nBe forewarned though: fortune does not like to be cheated.
LanguageData.YS_StabilizerRangeMinDesc: The minimum range of this building's stabilizing field. Cells within this field will not be affected during Jianghu Jin's terraforming.
LanguageData.YS_StabilizerRangeMaxDesc: The maximum range of this building's stabilizing field. Cells within this field will not be affected during Jianghu Jin's terraforming.
LanguageData.YS_StabilizerRangeCurrDesc: The current range of this building's stabilizing field. Cells within this field will not be affected during Jianghu Jin's terraforming.
